aria.compare: Press and hold to see original image
error.noImageFilter: No image loaded to apply a filter to.
error.noImageAdjust: No image loaded to apply an adjustment to.
error.noCropArea: Please select an area to crop.
error.enterDescription: Please enter a description for your edit.
error.clickToSelect: Please click on the image to select an area to edit.
retouch.placeholderReady: e.g., 'change my shirt color to blue'
retouch.placeholderClickFirst: First click a point on the image
retouch.click: Click an area on the image to make a precise edit.
retouch.click2: Great! Now describe your localized edit below.
header.title: Pixshop
start.title: AI Photo Editing,
start.subtitle: Retouch photos, apply creative filters, or make precise localized edits using simple text prompts. No complex tools.
start.orDragDrop: or drag and drop a file
start.card.retouch.title: Precise Retouch
start.card.retouch.body: Click any point to fix imperfections, change colors, or add elements with precision.
start.card.filters.title: Creative Filters
start.card.filters.body: Transform your image with ready-made styles—from retro looks to futuristic glows—or create your own.
start.card.adjust.title: Pro Adjustments
start.card.adjust.body: Enhance lighting, sharpen details, or change the mood. Get studio-quality results without complex tools.
panel.filter.title: Apply a Filter
panel.filter.placeholder: Or describe a custom filter (e.g., '80s synthwave glow')
panel.adjust.title: Apply a Professional Adjustment
panel.adjust.placeholder: Or describe an adjustment (e.g., 'change background to a forest')
panel.crop.title: Crop Image
panel.crop.tip: Click and drag on the image to select a crop area.
presets.adjust.blurBg.name: Blur Background
presets.adjust.blurBg.prompt: Apply a realistic depth-of-field effect by making the background blurry while keeping the main subject in sharp focus.
presets.adjust.enhance.name: Enhance Details
presets.adjust.enhance.prompt: Slightly enhance the sharpness and details of the image without making it look unnatural.
presets.adjust.warmer.name: Warmer Lighting
presets.adjust.warmer.prompt: Adjust the color temperature to give the image warmer, golden-hour style lighting.
presets.adjust.studio.name: Studio Light
presets.adjust.studio.prompt: Add dramatic, professional studio lighting to the main subject.
presets.filter.synth.name: Synthwave
presets.filter.synth.prompt: Apply a vibrant 80s synthwave aesthetic with neon magenta and cyan glows, and subtle scan lines.
presets.filter.anime.name: Anime
presets.filter.anime.prompt: Give the image a vibrant Japanese anime style, with bold outlines, cel-shading, and saturated colors.
presets.filter.lomo.name: Lomo
presets.filter.lomo.prompt: Apply a Lomography-style cross-processed look with high-contrast, oversaturated colors, and dark vignetting.
presets.filter.glitch.name: Glitch
presets.filter.glitch.prompt: Transform the image into a futuristic holographic projection with digital glitch effects and chromatic aberration.
error.title: An Error Occurred
retouch.ready: Great! Now describe your localized edit below.
retouch.clickFirst: Click an area on the image to edit.
seo.home.title: Pixshop — AI Photo Editing, Simplified
seo.home.description: Retouch photos, apply creative filters, or make precise localized edits using simple text prompts.
